description: The module offers instruction in music composition for students enrolled in the BMUS program in music composition or appropriate related majors. Its main component is a weekly one-hour consultation with a major study teacher. Students attend weekly composition seminars and other events related to contemporary music study, and receive training in tonal aural skills. Students are required to compose a minimum of 10 minutes of music and submit a portfolio of works at the end of the semester for juried evaluation. In consultation with their instructor, students define their composition projects in terms of form and instrumentation.
title: Composition Major Study 1B
